review: Doctor was very nice and with caring attitude. She understood the problem and provided requisite medication to the satisfaction of patient.

review: This is my first visit to the doctor. I am pretty satisfied with the first visit. The wait time was not high either

review: Great experience. the doctor paid a lot of attention and satisfactorily answered all the queries. Was able to give quick relief.
Good. Doctor is understanding & diagnosis is very good. However I don't understand why I'm charged everytime I went for a follow up also. Anyway I would recommend this doctor.
